plot: Avery has never approved of his younger brother Corey's sexual preference. After their mother dies of cancer, Corey eventually moves on while Avery becomes a wreck and hates Corey thinking their mother loved him more.
title: Corey & Avery
plot_es: Avery has never approved of his younger brother Corey's sexual preference. After their mother dies of cancer, Corey eventually moves on while Avery becomes a wreck and hates Corey thinking their mother loved him more.
